hero.titleStart: When someone searches for your service —
hero.titleHighlight: do they find you or your competitor?
hero.subtitle: Every day without a professional website, potential customers go to your competition. Get found on Google, AI search, and everywhere your customers are looking.

whatWeDo.title: A complete client acquisition system
whatWeDo.subtitle: Website + Advertising = clients actively searching for your services.

website.title: Professional Website
website.description: Your digital foundation. A website that looks professional, ranks in AI search results, and converts visitors into paying customers.
features: AI Search Ready (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI)
Built to convert visitors into clients

ads.title: Google Ads Management
ads.description: Accelerate your results. When someone searches "carpenter Oslo" or "plumber Bergen", your ad appears at the top. Direct leads from people actively looking.

whoWeHelp.title: Two paths to a stronger online presence
whoWeHelp.subtitle: Whether you need a new website or need to fix accessibility issues, we've got you covered.

segments.title: No website yet?
segments.description: You're a skilled craftsman, but clients can't find you online. Your competitors with websites are winning jobs that should be yours. AI assistants can't recommend you because you don't exist digitally.

segments.title: Website accessibility issues?
segments.description: 97% of Norwegian websites fail WCAG compliance checks. Your site might be breaking the law without you knowing it. Digdir conducts random audits and publishes results publicly.

portfolio.title: Designs that convert visitors into customers
portfolio.subtitle: Every template is AI-ready, WCAG compliant, and optimized for Norwegian businesses.

whyUs.title: The right partner for your online presence
whyUs.subtitle: We're not just another web agency. We build websites that are ready for the future.

reasons.title: Built for 2026+
points: AI Search optimization from day one
Your business gets recommended by ChatGPT and Google AI

reasons.title: We Handle Everything
points: You focus on your craft, we handle the rest

guarantee.title: 14-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.subtitle: Not satisfied with your website? Get a full refund within 14 days.
guarantee.description: We're confident you'll love your new website. But if for any reason you're not satisfied after we deliver it, simply contact us within 14 days and we'll refund your payment in full. No questions asked.

features.title: Full Refund Guaranteed
features.description: If you're not happy with your website, we'll refund 100% of your payment within 14 days.

features.title: 14 Days to Evaluate
features.description: Take your time to review your new website. You have 14 days from delivery to request a refund.

features.title: No Questions Asked
features.description: Simply email us at contact@dealcatcher.io and we'll process your refund immediately.

features.title: Revisions Included
features.description: Before requesting a refund, let us try to make it right. Reasonable revisions are included.

steps.title: You Pay & We Build
steps.description: Pay upfront and we create your complete website based on your brief.

steps.title: You Review
steps.description: We deliver your website. Review it and request any changes you need.

steps.title: Love It or Refund
steps.description: Happy? We go live. Not satisfied? Get your money back within 14 days.

guarantee.legal: This guarantee is your right under Norwegian consumer law (Angrerettloven). You can withdraw from the contract and receive a full refund within 14 days of receiving the completed service.

cta.subtitle: Every day you wait, potential customers find your competitors instead. Get your professional website in 7 days with zero risk.

footer.description: Professional websites for Norwegian businesses. AI-ready, WCAG compliant, built to convert.

cookieBanner.title: We value your privacy
cookieBanner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. Essential cookies are necessary for the website to function. Analytics cookies help us understand how you use our site.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: These cookies are strictly necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.

contactPage.title: Let's discuss your
contactPage.subtitle: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Rapid Software House sp. z o.o. ("we", "us", or "our") operates the dealcatcher.io website. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:
controller.company: Rapid Software House sp. z o.o.

dataCollected.title: Information We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information collected automatically:

cookies.title: Cookies and Analytics
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activities. We will ask for your consent before placing any non-essential cookies.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly. These cookies are strictly necessary and do not require consent.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Google Analytics)
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website. These cookies are only placed after you give your explicit consent through our cookie banner.

cookies.consent: When you first visit our website, you will see a cookie banner asking for your consent. You can choose to accept or decline analytics cookies. Your choice will be remembered for future visits.
cookies.manage: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the 'Cookie Settings' link in the footer of our website. You can also manage cookies through your browser settings.

purpose.title: How We Use Your Information
purpose.intro: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds under GDPR Article 6:

purposes.title: To improve our website and services

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected:
periods: Contact form data: 2 years from last contact
Contract-related data: Duration of contract + 5 years (legal requirement)

rights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.intro: As a data subject, you have the following rights:

list.title: Right of Access
list.description: You can request a copy of your personal data we hold.

list.title: Right to Rectification
list.description: You can request correction of inaccurate personal data.

list.title: Right to Erasure
list.description: You can request deletion of your personal data ("right to be forgotten").

list.title: Right to Restriction
list.description: You can request limitation of processing in certain circumstances.

list.title: Right to Data Portability
list.description: You can request your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

list.title: Right to Object
list.description: You can object to processing based on legitimate interests.

list.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
list.description: Where processing is based on consent, you can withdraw it at any time.

rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at contact@dealcatcher.io.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We may share your data with the following third-party service providers:

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA). When this occurs, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
contact.address: Address: ul. Zlota 75A lok. 7, 00-819 Warsaw, Poland
contact.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. If you are located in Norway, you can contact the Norwegian Data Protection Authority (Datatilsynet) at datatilsynet.no. If you are located elsewhere in the EU/EEA, you may contact your local supervisory authority or the President of the Personal Data Protection Office (UODO) in Poland.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of the dealcatcher.io website and services provided by Rapid Software House sp. z o.o. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

items.definition: Rapid Software House sp. z o.o., ul. Zlota 75A lok. 7, 00-819 Warsaw, Poland, KRS: 0001008811, NIP: 5273033283
Any person or entity accessing or using our website or services
A natural person acting for purposes outside their trade, business, craft or profession
The dealcatcher.io website and all its subpages
Website design, development, hosting, maintenance, and Google Ads management services offered by the Service Provider

services.title: Our Services
services.content: DealCatcher provides the following services to businesses and individuals:
services.note: Specific terms, pricing, and deliverables for each service are defined in individual service agreements.

withdrawalRight.title: Right of Withdrawal (Angrerett)
withdrawalRight.intro: If you are a consumer, you have the right to withdraw from a distance contract within 14 days without giving any reason, in accordance with the Norwegian Consumer Contracts Act (Angrerettloven).
withdrawalRight.deadline: The withdrawal period expires 14 days from the day on which the completed service is delivered to you.

howTo.title: How to Exercise Your Right of Withdrawal
howTo.content: To exercise the right of withdrawal, you must inform us of your decision to withdraw from the contract by an unambiguous statement. You can do this by:
methods: Using the withdrawal form available on our website

effects.title: Effects of Withdrawal
effects.content: If you withdraw from the contract, we shall reimburse all payments received from you without undue delay and no later than 14 days from the day on which we are informed about your decision to withdraw. We will carry out such reimbursement using the same means of payment as you used for the initial transaction, unless you have expressly agreed otherwise.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.content: The right of withdrawal does not apply if you have expressly consented to the commencement of the service during the withdrawal period and acknowledged that you will lose your right of withdrawal once the service has been fully performed.

subscriptionTerms.title: Subscription Terms
subscriptionTerms.intro: This section applies to our monthly subscription services (Basic and Premium hosting plans).

commitment.title: No Minimum Commitment
commitment.content: Our monthly plans have no minimum commitment period. You can cancel at any time.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time by contacting us at contact@dealcatcher.io. Cancellation will take effect at the end of the current billing period. You will continue to have access to the service until the end of the paid period.

autoRenewal.title: Automatic Renewal
autoRenewal.content: Subscriptions automatically renew each month until cancelled. You will be charged at the beginning of each billing period using the payment method on file. By subscribing, you authorize us to charge the applicable subscription fee.

priceChanges.title: Price Changes
priceChanges.content: We may change subscription prices with 30 days' notice. You will be notified by email before any price change takes effect. Continued use of the service after the price change constitutes acceptance of the new price.

useOfWebsite.title: Use of Website
useOfWebsite.intro: When using our website, you agree to:
rules: Provide accurate and complete information in any forms
Not use the website for any unlawful purpose
Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the website
Not interfere with the proper functioning of the website
Not copy, modify, or distribute website content without permission

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Rapid Software House sp. z o.o. or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written consent.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The website and its content are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the website will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free of viruses or other harmful components. This disclaimer does not affect your statutory rights as a consumer.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Rapid Software House sp. z o.o. shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of the website. Our total liability for any claims arising from your use of the website shall not exceed the amount you paid us, if any, in the 12 months preceding the claim. This limitation does not apply to liability that cannot be excluded or limited under applicable consumer protection laws.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Links
thirdParty.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites. You access such websites at your own risk.

consumerRights.title: Consumer Rights
consumerRights.content: If you are a consumer, you have statutory rights under Norwegian law that cannot be waived by contract. These include rights under the Consumer Purchases Act (Forbrukerkjøpsloven), the Consumer Contracts Act (Angrerettloven), and the Marketing Control Act (Markedsføringsloven). Nothing in these Terms shall affect your statutory consumer rights.

governing.title: Governing Law and Disputes
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Poland. For business customers, any disputes arising from these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Warsaw, Poland. However, if you are a consumer residing in Norway, you retain the right to bring proceedings in Norway and have Norwegian consumer protection laws apply to matters covered by such laws, in accordance with applicable EU regulations.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify existing customers of material changes by email at least 14 days before they take effect. Changes will be effective immediately for new customers upon posting to the website. Your continued use of the website after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms, please contact us:
contact.company: Rapid Software House sp. z o.o.

floatingContact.quickContact: Leave your number, we'll call you back
